item.title: Today’s Wordle #1684: Hints and Answer for January 28, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1684 for January 28, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 28, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1684 is an easier puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4 of 6 guesses. That makes it less challenging than the 4.8-guess average from January 27.

General Wordle Hints For January 28

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word describes behavior or actions, not objects.
  • Hint 2: It’s often used when someone is lacking empathy or kindness.
  • Hint 3: The word carries a strongly negative emotional tone.
  • Hint 4: You’ll frequently see it applied to people, decisions, or circumstances.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1684 for January 28, 2026.

Starter Words For January 28, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CURLY
  • RULED
  • ULCER
  • CRUDE

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1684 On January 28, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: CRUEL

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

CRUEL is an adjective that means “willfully or knowingly causing pain or distress to others.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1683 on January 27, 2026

Answer: DUSKY

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1684?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 29 will be Wordle Game #1685.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

item.title: ARC Raiders is Getting a New Ban System, But Players Don’t Think It’s Tough Enough
item.content:encoded:
ARC Raiders underwent a major update today as Embark Studios delivered Headwinds, the first of four content drops coming between now and April. It introduced seven new quests, a minor map condition, two new Augments, and some other bits and pieces. The team at Embark also revealed that, very soon, a new anti-cheat ban system will be implemented to combat malicious players.

In a footnote in the patch notes for the recent ARC Raiders update, the team explained that a permaban is the result of a cheating spree, but players don’t think getting to that point is happening fast enough for it to be effective.

Does ARC Raiders Need Tougher Anti-Cheat?

Over the festive period, ARC Raiders players were suffering under the weight of exploits, cheaters, and a bit of content stagnation brought on by everyone at Embark Studios going off on a well-deserved break.

Now that they’re back, a massive roadmap has been revealed, detailing content up to April 2026.

Today, the first part of that roadmap, an update dubbed ‘Headwinds’, was delivered. It introduced some fresh content, a map condition that fills Buried City with birds, and seven short new quests for players to conquer. It effectively opens up some of the game’s lore, too.

However, one element in the recent patch notes hasn’t filled players with the joy that the positive notes have.

Almost at the end of the update, it was written:

A three strikes progressive ban system is in the process of being implemented. Bans will progress from 30 days, to 60 and finally a permaban for repeat offenders.

Those who tussled with these more malicious players in recent weeks feel that the ban loop isn’t strong enough for anyone caught cheating. The item was subtitled ‘Anti-Cheat’, but it reads like this is a general approach to banning players caught breaking the rules, and not just cheaters.

In any case, a cheater being banned for just 30 days feels like little more than a slap on the wrist. The second infraction earns them a 60-day penalty, but it takes three offences for them to receive a permanent ban. That’s three times that somebody could be caught using cheats to manipulate the game before Embark Studios says, ‘Enough.’

Other extraction shooters, like Escape from Tarkov, issue permanent bans upon a single detection of cheating, and they publicly reveal which users have been kicked from the game. Sure, they might make a new account and come back, but the strong-arm approach is there at the initial stage.

Do you think ARC Raiders needs tougher anti-cheat, and that Embark Studios is risking displeasing the majority of its userbase? Let us know your thoughts on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that a Black Flag remake statue has apparently appeared

item.title: IEM Krakow 2026—Teams, Schedule, and Where to Watch
item.content:encoded:
IEM Katowice is officially no more, and the competition has moved to Krakow for 2026. This monumental change seemed drastic at the time, but fans are now readying themselves to visit a new city for this supersized tournament. In this guide, we’re breaking down everything you need to know about IEM Krakow 2026, including the schedule, teams competing, and where to watch it.

If you’re interested in IEM Krakow betting or just want to watch your favourite teams and players enjoying Counter-Strike 2 action live on stream, read on.

IEM Krakow 2026 Schedule and Location

IEM Krakow 2026 will take place at the TAURON Arena in the city of Kraków, Poland. It’s set to run from January 28th to February 8th, and in that time, 24 teams will fight for the lion’s share of a massive $1 million prize.

Here’s the IEM Krakow 2026 schedule and format:

Play-In Stage

During this stage, 16 teams come together for the Play-In round, which features a double-elimination bracket and a series of best-of-three matches. It’s a whittling round here, and only the top eight will make it through to the next round to face the higher-seeded competitors.

Group Stage

The Group Stage includes the eight successful teams from the Play-In Stage and the eight that had already qualified with a higher seeding for IEM Krakow. The teams will compete along another double-elimination pathway, with each group being made up of eight teams in total.

The Group Stage winners go through to the semi-finals, the runners-up advance to the Quarterfinals as high seeds, and the third-place teams go through to the Quarterfinals as low seeds. Only the top three teams from each group will land in the Playoffs.

Playoffs

The Playoffs will crown the champion at IEM Krakow 2026. This is a single-elimination bracket with a best-of-five grand final that will see six teams fight for the grand prize – $400,000.

IEM Krakow 2026 Teams

Here is the full list of the teams qualified to compete at IEM Krakow 2026:

Directly Qualified

  • FURIA
  • Team Vitality
  • Team Falcons
  • Team Spirit
  • Natus Vincere
  • MOUZ
  • FaZe Clan
  • The MongolZ

Play-In Teams

  • Aurora Gaming
  • B8
  • Legacy
  • G2 Esports
  • Team Liquid
  • 3DMAX
  • Astralis
  • PARIVISION
  • HEROIC
  • paiN Gaming
  • FUT Esports
  • Ninjas in Pyjamas
  • Passion UA
  • BC.Game Esports
  • NRG
  • GamerLegion

IEM Krakow 2026 Predictions

Team Vitality enters the running as the primary title contender, despite recent losses. For a safe IEM Krakow bet, you’d consider backing them, or for similar odds, Team Spirit. FURIA has been on a resurgence of late, and the Brazilian roster could make for a middle-of-the-road bet if you’re playing outrights.

Elsewhere, a swing-tier squad like Team Liquid and Ninjas in Pyjamas could manufacture an underdog win that could result in a nice return for Counter-Strike betting fans.

Where to Watch IEM Krakow 2026

If you’re going to place live bets on IEM Krakow 2026 or just want to watch the action unfold, here are the links you need:

  • ESL on Twitch
  • ESL on YouTube
  • IEM Krakow in Russian
  • IEM Krakow in French

Are you going to be watching IEM Krakow 2026? Let us know your predictions on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming esports, check out the latest major change to the Call of Duty League

item.title: Fallout Season 2 Episode 8 Release Date Countdown & Start Times
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to crawl out through the Fallout one more time with episode 8 of Fallout Season 2. Amazon’s stunning adaptation is reaching its conclusion, and Season 2’s episode 8 release date draws closer than a Bloatfly to your irradiated presence.

The Ink Spots famously sang about not wanting to set the world on fire, and yet, Amazon’s Fallout adaptation has constantly been on fire. Every episode has knocked it out of the park. Fallout Season 2 has been a joy to watch from start to finish, and the high stakes are about to be raised one more time in New Vegas.

When Is Fallout Season 2 Episode 8 Coming Out? Release Date, Explained

Tuesday, February 3, is the official release date for Fallout Season 2, episode 8.

The last couple of episodes of Season 2 have been rejigged by Amazon slightly. But you have no excuse for missing it now with this information! The reason for Amazon’s tinkering with episode 7 and episode 8 was “Due to strong participation and interest,” which, in short, was to make it available for more regions earlier and cut down on potential spoilers.

No one wants a finale ruined for them, making this a commendable gesture by Amazon.

Fallout Season 2 Episode 8 Start Times & Dates

The United States claims the first release time for Fallout Season 2 Episode 8 with a 6 PM PT start time on February 3. Insider Gaming has also provided more time zones for you to check out, including GMT and AET.

It’s the United Kingdom who are probably most at risk for an episode 8 spoiler due to the 2 AM start time! Whereas many other regions are getting more favorable start times.

Take a look at this table and see when Season 2 episode 8 airs for you.

If episode 8 is even half as good as the rest, then Fallout’s newest batch of TV is about to go out with a Megaton ending, atomic bomb-sized bang.

Making sure to use BIG spoiler warnings, head to the Insider Gaming Discord Server and discuss Fallout Season 2 so far. What’s been your favorite episode, and how do you think episode 8 will end the series?

Also, read about Fallout 3 and New Vegas Remakes not releasing anytime soon for more franchise news.
